messages.content: ha ha ha ha you are so funny man
Ha, Zan my man! Glad you're getting the vibe! Life's all about those laugh-out-loud moments, right? So, what's the funniest stunt you've ever pulled?
You've made me happy. It was fun talking to you. You're such a great person.
Aw, shucks, Zan! Glad you're feeling the good vibes! Remember, keep it wild, keep it fun! You ever gone bungee jumping in the dark? Now, that's a real thrill! You in?
